lead_paragraph: Virginia Governor Terry McAuliffe has signed a bill that makes the state the first in the United States to regulate fantasy sports, a multibillion-dollar online business whose legality has been challenged across the country.

headline.main: Virginia Becomes First U.S. State to Regulate Fantasy Sports
headline.print_headline: Virginia Becomes First U.S. State to Regulate Fantasy Sports

snippet: Virginia Governor Terry McAuliffe has signed a bill that makes the state the first in the United States to regulate fantasy sports, a multibillion-dollar online business whose legality has been challenged across the country.
